review: Got my teeth implants done at from Dr. Parampreet. My experience with has been very good. She has provided the very best level of care and comfort to me. The clinic is well equipped and very tech oriented. The transparency with which they operate is something that blew my mind. I was shown every little details with cameras, mirrors, computer etc and this made me well aware of what is happening with my teeth. This added so much faith in the treatment that during the procedure my mind was so much at ease. After care was really good, everything was seamless. Would definitely recommend to anyone and everyone.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Dental Implants,Advanced surgery in Implantology,Zirconia Crowns,Missing Teeth,
review: Excellent experience with Dr. Parampreet Kohli. Had taken my father after one of my friend told me about her. Got 8 dental implants placed. He could’nt eat properly before and it was bothering me from quite some time to see him suffer like this. Did my research on dental implants and how to get fixed teeth. Was amazed to see that such complex procedure are done so skillfully and in no time. Total 2 appointments it took, each around an hour or so. Doctor Parampreet is such a nice doctor. My father was so comfortable getting the treatment done, he was communicating with her very openly, we were a little scared and were asking lots of questions and she answered each and every question of ours very emphatically. The followups by the team at Smile Couture was exceptional. They reply promptly, genuinely care about how the patient is doing after the treatment. I admire this. Please don’t think twice, just go and get a consult done for any issue that you are facing, the are the best dentist here.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Bleeding Gums Treatment, Treatment for bleeding/ Swolen Gums,Bleeding Gums,Dental Cleaning,
review:
I was suffering from massive gum bleeding from a really long time and I couldn’t understand why. I looked for best dental clinic around me and found smile couture dental clinic and booked an appointment with Dr. Parampreet kohli.
During the consultation Dr. Parampreet checked everything and suggested that I am not able to maintain a good oral hygiene hence resulting in to the infection in the gums leading to bleeding. She did a deep clean up for me and recommended the use of water flosser.
Its been couple of weeks since the deep clean up, I can significantly see the difference.
Really happy with the services.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,Value for money,
context: Implants(Fixed Teeth),Dental Implant Fixing,Dental Crowns,Implant Prosthesis,Bone Grafting for Dental Implants,
review:
my mother was visiting for couple of weeks from our home town and she had a really bad experience with a dentist here. So recently I got my wisdom tooth removed at smile couture dental clinic and had a good experience so decided to take my mom there.

the consultation was done by Dr. parampreet kohli and she was patient and listened to my mom and what all dental issues she was having. since ,my mom didn't have teeth on both sides in the lower arch, Dr. parampreet recommended 2 implants on each side followed by a screw retained bridge.

the implant placement was done in one sitting on both the sides and it was quite painless and smooth for my mom. post the surgery Dr. Parampreet made sure that she followed up how my mom was doing. My mom is really comfortable and happy. 

will definitely recommend Dr. parampreet kohli

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Wisdom Tooth Extraction,Surgical Tooth Extraction,
review:
I got a really badly infected wisdom tooth taken out at smile couture dental clinic. The whole procedure was quite pain less and the doctor kept checking on me during the treatment if I was comfortable.
The tooth was out in less that 15 mins with zero pain and the path of recovery was super smooth.
Will highly recommend smile couture dental clinic. I thank the entire team and doctor Parampreet Kohli for providing such a nice experience to relieve my pain.

review: Finding the right place for a dental implant was a big worry for me. I didn't know where to go or who to trust. Then someone told me about Smile Couture Dental Clinic in Andheri West and said that the dentist Dr. Parampreet Kohli is an MDS and an experienced Implantologist *** **** *** ** *** **** ******* *** ****** ******** ** ******* From the first time I visited, I felt like this place was very different in comparison to the other dentist in andheri that I have visited. Dr. Parampreet Kohli was very kind and talked to me in simple words, making everything easy to understand. She took her time to listen to me, never rushing, and always asking during the treatment if I was okay. The procedure of fixing of dental implants took multiple sittings and every time I went there, she would tell me what was happening and what would come next. This made me feel comfortable and less scared. The whole place is very neat and clean and filled with positive energy. Everyone working there, not just Dr. Parampreet Kohli, was helpful and took good care of me. They always had a smile and made sure I was doing fine…… After my dental implant treatment was completed, I was informed of the post implant care tips to make sure that it is well taken care of. Eating, talking, smiling – everything feels normal again. I'm really happy with how things turned out. A big thank you to dr Parampreet Kohli and everyone at Smile Couture Dental clinic. They did a great job and made everything easy for me. *** ** ********** *** **** ******* **** ** **** * **** ***** **** *****

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Dental Implant Fixing,Implant / RCT,RCT - Root Canal Treatment,Surgical Tooth Extraction,Dental Implant,
review:
Extremely satisfied with my entire dental experience with Dr. Parampreet Kohli. I searched online for a good dentist nearby and came across her clinic. Read the reviews and called them up for appointment. Giving a brief history about me, I had undergone a root canal treatment around 6 years ago and it was not a pleasant experience and I was very fearful of having a root canal again. Was having pain in the same tooth for a long time but was not willing to go to a dentist. The pain became severe and that’s when I actually went on google and typed best dentist in lokhandwala and started reading the reviews of Smile Couture Dental Clinic. Really liked the reviews and decided to give it a try.

Right from the moment I visited the dental clinic, I had several instances where I was delighted. The way the dentist spoke and consulted me. She asked me every single detail about what I was going thru. She made a point to understand my dental fears and I started feeling nice about the dentist as I was sharing more and more information. 

The tooth was examined and it was found that we had to extract it and place a dental implant. Dentist Kohli explained what dental implant means and how they function. I got to know about various treatments done via dental implants. I immediately decided to go for the treatment and my tooth was extracted and the dental implant was placed. I was watching TV while all this was happening and trust me the treatment and the procedure was very smooth and comfortable. The entire treatment of dental implant took around 30 minutes, I was well informed what each and every step of dental implant will be and that made me go away with my dental fear.

I got my teeth cleaning and teeth polishing done after my dental implant treatment. The dental clinic is really well made, they have car parking available. I have my next appointment in about 3 months where I will be getting a dental crown placed over my dental implant. Really happy and satisfied with the entire experience. Would highly recommend this amazing dental clinic in andheri and I am glad that I have found Dr. Parampreet Kohli, she is undoubtly the best dentist in mumbai.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Dental Crowns,Zirconia Crowns,RCT - Root Canal Treatment,
review:
I visited for a root canal and crown procedure with Dr. Parampreet Kohli at her clinic Smile Couture Dental Clinic in andheri west, and I cannot praise them enough for their exceptional care and outstanding results. They made me feel comfortable and at ease, which was crucial for someone who was slightly anxious about dental procedures. Dr. Parampreet Kohli, who explained the root canal and crown procedure, is an expert, she is so experienced. Her attention to detail and gentle approach helped alleviate my concerns. She thoroughly explained each step of the process, ensuring I was well-informed and confident in my decision.
The root canal itself was absolutely painless. The process of getting a crown was very impressive. Dr. Parampreet’s expertise made it look really natural. The clinic's commitment to hygiene and safety standards was exceptional. 
the best thing about this dental clinic is the post-procedure care and the follow-up. Dr. Parampreet and the clinic's staff provided clear instructions for aftercare, and they were readily available to address any concerns or questions I had.
In the end, I couldn't be happier with the results of my root canal and crown procedure at Smile Couture Dental Clinic. They have given me back my confident smile, and I'm genuinely grateful for their expertise and care. Anyone looking for the best dental clinic in Andheri West, please without a doubt come visit Smile Couture Dental Clinic, and I can guarantee you will not be disappointed.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Dental Crowns,Zirconia Crowns,Aesthetic Dentistry,Dental Implant,
review: Went to the dental clinic to get a dental implant done in one of my teeth, got the implant placed and the doctor gave me a temporary tooth for aesthetic purpose. I am writing a bit longer review explaining about my procedure. Very happy with the experience, the dentist is a young girl and I found her very experienced. Previously I was unable to find a good dentist near me and one of my friend told me about Dr. Parampreet. I called up the dental clinic and took an appointment, and told about my issue. She educated me with respect to the available options in dental implant and also on various types of crowns that I could choose from. Best thing about her was that she patiently explained everything in detail and answered all my questions which helped me come up with a decision. I agreed to go ahead with the treatment. The procedure was smooth, painfree and I found her hands to be very gentle. The temporary tooth is very good. Clinic is really well made, its looks very hygienic and safe. Waiting for my implant to get attached to my bone properly and after approximately 3 months will get my cap fixed. Finally, I would like to mention that Dr. Parampreet Kohli is an MDS in implantology and has a lot of experience in placing dental implants and crowns, please don’t hesitate to visit her if you want to get these treatments done. I am happy to find her and her dental clinic near me. She is experienced, passionate and stays in the same building as the clinic which gives me peace of mind that I could reach out to her during any dental emergency.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Dental Cleaning,
review:
I was having a really bad gum irritation since past couple of days and decided to look for a dentist near me and found smile couture dental clinic.
I met Dr. Parampreet for my consultation and she did the check up and x-rays for me. Upon taking the xray we realised there was cavity causing the food to stuck over there hence leading to gum swelling and irritation. She cleaned the cavity for me and called me after 3-4 days till my gums healed and did the filling for me.
My gums are feeling better and also she kept checking on me through out the treatment which I really appreciate.
Thankyou

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Tooth Extraction,Emergency Dental Treatment,
review:
My mom was having horrible tooth ache and it was Sunday morning and I looked for a dental clinic around me and found smile couture dental clinic. When we spoke to the clinic, they took us in an emergency. We met Dr. Parampreet kohli and she checked my mom and took the xrays.
Once the xray was taken she explained us that the tooth is infected and it has to be taken out. The procedure was done by Dr. Parampreet and through out the treatment my mom was at ease.
Will definitely recommend Dr. Parampreet kohli and Smile couture dental clinic.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Full Mouth Rehabilitation,FULL MOUTH IMPLANT,Dental Implant Fixing,Bone Grafting for Dental Implants,Oral & Maxillofacial Surgery,
review:
I recently underwent a full mouth implant prosthesis at Smile Couture Dental clinic, and I couldn't be happier with the results! I will not lie that I was very apprehensive about getting the whole procedure done, but the way Dr. Parampreet kohli ensured me that the whole process will not be painful and what I really appreciated was that at the beginning only a complete treatment plan was given to us with the time line, which made it quote clear.
So firstly I underwent 6 implants in the upper and lower arch (both done at 10 days apart) post that she gave me a temporary denture for 3 months.
After 3 months of the surgery, the permanent caps were put over the implant and the results are simply amazing. My new smile looks and feels incredibly natural. It's hard to believe that I have implants – they all feel so natural. I can eat and enjoy food like how I used to when I had my natural teeth.
The professionalism and expertise of Smile Couture Dental Clinic team is truly outstanding. They meticulously planned and executed the entire procedure with precision and care. I felt minimal discomfort throughout the process, which is a testament to their skill.
Will definitely recommend Dr. Parampreet kohli and her services

review: My father was having missing teeth for a while and I wanted to find and consult a good dentist near me. I searched online and found Smile Couture Dental Clinic in andheri west. We took a consultation from Dr Parampreet Kohli and she very nicely explained about dental implants, dentures and bridges. We underwent dental implant treatment and got 2 implants placed on the same day itself. The entire procedure took just an hour and it was conducted very smoothly. After the treatment, Dr kohli and her team made sure that they were following up on how my father were doing. This part really touched my heart as we were not expecting them to do such proactive followups. we came after about 3 months and got dental crowns place on top of them. got a warranty certificate for the zirconia crowns and the dental implants. again the followup post the treatment was amazing.  she is indeed the best dentist in mumbai as far as I am aware… everything is so professional and human at the same time. they have car parking available, have all experienced dentists in the clinic. I am very satisfied with the experience and I am happy ** ******* **** *** **** ****** ****** **** ** and would recommend them to everyone looking for the best dentist for themselves or their family.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Teeth Whitening, Teeth cleaning & polishing,Laser Assisted Teeth whitening,Scaling / Polishing,
review:
I recently visited Smile Couture Dental Clinic in Andheri West for teeth whitening. I was searching for a clinic near my vicinity in Lokhandwala and their previous reviews were impressive along with the pleasing aesthetics in photographs, and I couldn't be happier with the results! From the moment I walked in, I was greeted with warmth and professionalism that immediately put me at ease.

The staff along with Dr Parampreet at the clinic is exceptional. They took the time to thoroughly explain the teeth whitening process, answer all my questions, and address any concerns I had. Their expertise was evident, and it's clear they genuinely care about their patients' oral health and satisfaction.

The teeth whitening procedure itself was comfortable and efficient. The dental hygienist made sure I was comfortable throughout the treatment, and the results were truly remarkable. My teeth are now several shades whiter, and the transformation is incredible.

What sets Smile Couture Dental Clinic apart is their commitment to patient comfort and safety. The clinic is impeccably clean and well-maintained, which is particularly important in the current health climate. The equipment and technology they use are top-notch, ensuring both effectiveness and safety

I would really recommend this clinic to anyone for their dental requirements.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Doctor friendliness,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Dental Crowns,Bone Grafting for Dental Implants, Teeth cleaning & polishing,Zirconia Crowns,Dental Implant,
review:
I want to share my wonderful experience with Dr. Parampreet Kohli. I recently underwent a dental implant treatment at her dental clinic in Andheri West, Mumbai and I'm genuinely delighted with the outcome.

Dr. Parampreet Kohli is not just a skilled dentist, but she's also incredibly kind and caring. From the moment I walked into her clinic, I felt at ease. She took the time to explain the entire procedure to me, making sure I understood every step.

During the treatment, Dr. Kohli's precision and attention to detail were impressive. She made sure I was comfortable throughout the process, which meant a lot to me. It's clear that she's passionate about her work and cares deeply for her patients and this is something which is very difficult to find now a days. All the doctors are so much in a hurry to finish and take the next patient in. But here I felt heard and I was explained each and every detail. 

Now, I have a perfect dental crown over my dental implant that looks and feels fantastic. I couldn't be happier with the results. I wholeheartedly recommend Dr. Kohli to anyone in need of dental care. Her expertise and compassion make all the difference.

A big thank you to Dr. Kohli for giving me a reason to smile confidently again

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Painful Teething,Broken Teeth,Dental Implant Fixing,Dental Implant,
review:
I was having a pain in my lower right back tooth since last 3-4 months. I did my research online and started looking for best dental clinic in oshiwara. I found Smile couture dental clinic and met their chief MDS dentist Dr. Parampreet , she evaluated my condition, took couple of xrays and found out that my old root canal got infected and hence I was having the pain. I was shown the X rays and we could see that a broken piece of metal was inside my tooth which was left while my previous root canal was done. The tooth was severely infected and Dr. Kohli did the teeth extraction and then placed an immediate implant.

I was not aware about dental implants and usually I do my research thoroughly before deciding to do any treatment, but the way the dentist explained the entire procedure, she showed me videos of the dental implant treatment, answered all my questions, it just built up the trust immediately. I immediately decided to go for the teeth extraction treatment followed by placing the dental implant. The entire procedure was so smooth, it happened in less that 30 minutes.

context: Dental Fillings,Invisible/Clear Braces,Dental Cavity Filling,Misaligned Teeth,Braces,
review:
I have severe mal alignment issue, since childhood everyone told me about braces and I simply hated the idea of it.

I came for few cavity issue to Smile couture dental clinic and I met Dr. Parampreet Kohli. She nicely did all my fillings and explained me the reason for the cavity, which was improper oral hygiene since since my teeth were not aligned.

I told her about my hatred towards the braces and she gave me the idea of invisible braces also called aligners. We got my scan done and they showed me on the scan how my teeth will look post the aligner treatment.

I decided to go ahead with it and its been 6 months now, I can see the changes happening and I am loving it.

Will totally recommend Dr. Parampreet kohli and her clinic, Totally worth it!!

context: Dental Cavity Filling,Bad Breath,
review: I had a very good experience! Recently, I got my tooth filling done by Dr. Parampreet Kohli to fix a problem with food getting stuck in my teeth and I was having really bad breath. The entire procedure was done in a hygienic and professional way, which gave me a lot of confidence in her abilities. She listened to me patiently, showed me the area affected and informed me about the issue and the treatment plan. After the cleaning and tooth filling, I feel comfort and relief from my bad breath. I am really happy and satisfied with her treatment. Dr. Kohli is an MDS doctor *** *** ** **** ************* *** ******* ******* *** takes a lot of care to ensure her patients get the best treatment possible. I would highly recommend her and Smile Couture Dental Clinic to anyone looking for a trustworthy and experienced dentist.
reply_text:
Dear Radha,

Thank you so much for writing about your experience and sharing it with us. I am glad that we could solve your issue of bad breath. Since we have done a permanent tooth filling, you should not be having any bad breath because of that issue. Please continue to take care of your oral hygiene as we discussed and you should be fine with respect to your oral health.

Regards
Dr. Parampreet Kohli, 
MDS - Prosthodontics, Crown & Bridges, 
PGCOI - Advanced Oral Implantology

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Implant Rehabilitation,Dental Implant,
review:
I am beyond grateful for the outstanding care and results my mother received during her Dental Implant rehabilitation done by Dr. Parampreet kohli at her clinic  Smile Couture Dental Clinic in Andheri west. Our experience at this clinic has been nothing short of remarkable, and I want to express my heartfelt appreciation.
Dr. Parampreet demonstrated a level of compassion, professionalism, and expertise that put my mother at ease. She had been apprehensive about undergoing implant rehabilitation, but Dr. Parampreet attention to my mom’s needs made all the difference. She not only explained the entire process clearly but also showed immense patience and empathy towards my mother's concerns and questions. This level of personalized care made all the difference in her comfort and confidence.
The implant rehabilitation procedure itself was executed with precision and care. Dr. Parampreet ensured that my mother experienced minimal discomfort and pain, and they consistently monitored her well-being throughout the process. Overall, I had such an amazing experience and will highly recommend Dr. Parampreet and Smile Couture Dental Clinic to anyone who is looking for a good dentist in Andheri West, Mumbai

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Chipped Tooth,Zirconia Crowns,Ceramic Veneers / Crowns ,Underbite,Dental Checkup (General),
review:
My teeth kept chipping off especially the back one and I decided to look for a good dentist near me who could help me find a solution to this issue. So I looked for a Dentist in Andheri West and came across Smile Couture Dental Clinic. Dr. Parampreet kohli did my initial consultation and she explained to me the reason for my teeth chipping off. She made a treatment plan for me which required me to get the caps done on all of my teeth and also which will help me raise my bite.
The complete treatment was done in 2 phases and in 2 months it was finished.
I am impressed with their services and the transparency of the prices and I love my new smile and I can chew my food properly.
Highly recommended

review: Dr. Parampreet is a true pro when it comes to dental implants. I was missing a tooth for quite some time, and it was affecting my confidence. She explained the implant process thoroughly, and the implant placement went incredibly smoothly. The new tooth feels just like my own, and I can't thank her enough for giving me a complete smile again. If you're looking for dental implants treatment, don’t even think twice. She has her dental clinic in Andheri West, Mumbai.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Wisdom Tooth Extraction,Surgical Tooth Extraction,Impaction / Impacted Tooth Extraction,
review:
I woke up with a severe pain in my lower jaw on the right side and I looked for a dental clinic in Andheri west and found Smile couture dental clinic.
I immediately called them and asked for an appointment, they were very accommodating and saw me in an urgent basis. I met Dr. Parampreet kohli and I must she is simply amazing, she immediately put me ease, she took my xrays and explained me my wisdom tooth condition and why it needs to be taken out. She put me on antibiotics and pain medicine which gave me relief and I went ahead with the extraction after a couple of days.
Extraction was super smooth and post the extraction Dr. Parampreet kept following up with me which I really appreciate.
Amazing service will totally recommend her.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Fixed Partial Denture (FPD),Crowns and Bridges Fixing,Dental Bridges,Surgical Tooth Extraction,RCT - Root Canal Treatment,
review:
Overall was very satisfied, Doctor Parampreet Kohli is so friendly and she speaks so softly and with care, it put me at ease immediately after we met. My dental procedure was done really smoothly. Doctor took care to see if I was comfortable throughout the procedure which frankly few doctors care about nowadays. I felt heard and well informed. The way she has made the entire her dental clinic setup is something to admire. They have car parking for the customers which I feel speaks a lot about their patient service. 

Plus everything is so clean and hygienic with all latest equipments. Staff is also good, polite and helpful.

Would definitely recommend. 👍
